sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是淺埋岩溶區常見的一種地質災害。

sentences.english: Industrial Index of Karst Accumulat ion Bauxite Orebody at Pingguo;
sentences.chinese: 岩溶堆積型鋁土礦是國內新類型的鋁土礦牀。

sentences.english: The paleokarst is not developed in vertical zoning and corroded cavity is isolated with poor connectivity.
sentences.chinese: 岩溶發育垂向分帶不明顯，溶蝕孔洞孤立且連通性差。

sentences.english: The karst groundwater in this basin is controlled by the different type and scale of groundwater storing geological structures.
sentences.chinese: 該盆地岩溶水受不同類型和規模的蓄水構造控制。

sentences.english: Weathering, Karst Landscapes, and Mass Movement.
sentences.chinese: 風化，岩溶景觀和羣衆運動。

sentences.english: Tectonic action is the primary factor that controls palaeo-rock-solution development of ordovician carbonate beneath salt.
sentences.chinese: 構造作用是控制鹽下奧陶系岩溶發育主要因素。

sentences.english: Landscape mainly consists of water in karst topography and the two broad categories.
sentences.chinese: 境內地貌主要分流水地貌和岩溶地貌兩大類。

sentences.english: In recent years, karst collapses have frequently occurred in Zaozhuang City.
sentences.chinese: 近年來棗莊市岩溶塌陷頻繁發生。

sentences.english: This paper mainly expounds a new method for predicting the distribution, especially the elevations, of karst caves.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要論述預測岩溶洞穴分佈位置和高程的新方法。

sentences.english: Soil of Fe-Mn nodules background in Litang karst was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對黎塘岩溶區鐵錳結核背景下的土壤進行了分析。

sentences.english: Epi-Fissure-Karst Zone(EFKZ)is commonly observed in karst mountainous area at the middle latitude of P.
sentences.chinese: 表層裂隙岩溶帶廣泛分佈於我國中緯度岩溶地區。

sentences.english: Epi-Fissure-Karst Zone(EFKZ)is commonly observed in karst mountainous area at the middle latitude of P.
sentences.chinese: 表層裂隙岩溶帶廣泛分佈於我國中緯度岩溶地區。

sentences.english: The karst at the foundation works of Baling River Bridge is very developed.
sentences.chinese: 壩陵河大橋基礎工程岩溶非常發育。

sentences.english: Soil is the most scarce and non - regenerated resource in Karst area.
sentences.chinese: 土壤是岩溶地區不易再生的最稀缺資源。

sentences.english: Yanhe spring karst water system is one of the famous springs in North China.
sentences.chinese: 山西省延河泉岩溶水系統是我國北方岩溶大泉之一。

sentences.english: Yanhe spring karst water system is one of the famous springs in North China.
sentences.chinese: 山西省延河泉岩溶水系統是我國北方岩溶大泉之一。

definition: karst landform (weathered limestone, often forming caves)
Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
